body_html:
@AyubQuadri based on your script, it seems that your import tensorflow as tf isn't picking up the GPU version that you installed.

I'm not a python expert, but to figure out what file you're importing, you can do something like this:

import tensorflow as tf
tf.file

I'm expecting you'll be picking up some other non-gpu install.

I'm expecting you'll be picking up some other non-gpu install.
body:
@AyubQuadri based on your script, it seems that your `import tensorflow as tf` isn't picking up the GPU version that you installed.

I'm not a python expert, but to figure out what file you're importing, you can do something like this:

>>> import tensorflow as tf
>>> tf.__file__

I'm expecting you'll be picking up some other non-gpu install.
